summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing charges for shipping services provided on April 19, 2001. It includes information about transportation charges, handling surcharges, and payment details, indicating a due date for payment by May 5, 2001.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Eric Gany is listed as the shipper on the FedEx invoice.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is mentioned as the recipient of the package shipped via FedEx.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Delivery
events.description: A package was delivered via FedEx on April 19, 2001.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 5-789-50506, dated April 20, 2001.
Total charges for the shipment amount to USD 37.44.
The payment is due by May 5, 2001.
A fuel surcharge of 1.44 was applied to the shipment.
The package was picked up on April 18, 2001, and delivered on April 19, 2001.
